Mais um dia de aprendizado 💭

Expecting #women and new #mothers are looking outside of the western #medical field—to #Instagram, #bloggers, and curated #online services—for #community, #culture, and #consumer products that normalize #pregnancy, get real about #motherhood, and reject a “one-size-fits-all” approach to these life-altering milestones.

Cassandra’s Modern Parents report, published June 2016, writes that #millennial #parents “want to share what it’s really like to raise #children and are publicly admitting their uncertainties and challenges on #socialmedia while still sharing the joyous moments.” Furthermore, they are rebelling against the “ceaseless stream of childrearing advice, content, and products” and aligning with #brands that support a more “instinctive” approach.

One such brand is #Storq, an online destination for modern, no-fuss essentials for pregnancy, nursing, and parenthood, including a sleek and minimal nursing bra, caftan, dress, and carry-all. Unlike its blissed-out or out-of-touch predecessors, Storq sets out to treat new moms and pregnant ladies as human. “We design pieces that look and feel like what you would normally use and wear, because dammit, you are a human being and having kids does not make you a different person,” reads its website. Visit jwtintelligence.com for the full story. 📸 @storq

Kids are going bananas for Tesco’s free fruit initiative which has seen 20 million pieces of fresh fruit given away over the last ten months.
--
July marks the year anniversary of the supermarket’s pioneering scheme which has proved a real hit since its launched last summer in around 800 UK stores. And parents say being given free fruit has helped encourage a greater interest and consumption from their children.
--
The initial idea came from Tesco customer assistant Maria Simpson and has seen children tuck into more than six and a half million apples, eight million bananas and five and half million oranges since its inception.
--
(Produce Business, May 2017)

We are tasked with conducting an online survey on a new to market Sit-In-Bakery where customers can order baked goods and enjoy them in a nice “eatery” styled environment. 
The purpose of this survey is to ascertain the product and service offerings required of a sit-in bakery by its customers.

Your participation in this study will contribute immensely to generating concrete consumer insight and a better understanding of customer expectation. 
Do follow the link in our bio to get started and thank you for your time.

#azizadesign #humancentreddesign #design #TIA #thisisafrica #lagos #nigeria #survey #bakery #bistro #breakfast #consumer #insight

WAR ON WASTE : unnatural cosmetic standards set by the big supermarkets deem 40% of one of the biggest banana crops in Australia, trash. Too big, too small, too funny shaped.. and that's before they even leave the farm! From there, 1/5 of the average Australians shopping basket ends up in landfill.. & the supermarkets dumpsters themselves resemble a dishevelled marketplace of perfectly edible foods! 
This is a picture I took almost a year ago, harvested from various supermarket dumpsters over one night. It nourished a wedding party of 100 guests over 2 nights, serviced a zesty cocktail bar with homemade mixers, & had enough food left over by the end of the weekend to send everyone home with a goodie bag. 
Its not an uncommon sight, something crazy like 8 million tonnes of food ends up in landfill in Australia, every year.
If you missed the War on Waste last night on the ABC, chase it up on iview.. its well worth the watch & inspiration to make change.
.
#beekeep #waronwaste #waronwasteau #ABC #australia #consumer #cosmetic #food #waste #dumpsters #dumpsterdiving #supermarkets #sizedoesntmatter #beautiful #ugly #nutritious #allthesame #zerowaste #change

repost from our Ganja Bro @santdn
This is a picture of the happiest Sanya has been in a long while. Holding this baby Cannabis plant. This Medicine. It's helping me write this right now. Without it I probably couldn't formulate a sentence right. Couldn't deal with the pain I go thru every day. I don't talk about the state of my physical or mental health a lot, but it is never great. Growing up, I didn't think I would make it this far. Not only is this helping me mentally & physically, but it's my #muse, my #inspiration , & my #TrueLove . Will be educating myself about this plant n its family plants to better help myself and others🌎 I urge you to do the same. I refuse to let someone else dictate what helps me🍁🌱 #Cannabis #education #plant #medicine #vegan #toronto #ontario #politics #believe #freemarket #consumer #freedomofchoice #mentalhealth #business #chronicpain #health @justinpjtrudeau #RespectThePlant
